options.content:
NTM - Nexus Traffic Monitoring - Locations

Location(s) - ${location}

targets.query: select count(last) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE type='nexus' and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),location) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
select count(last) from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/) and $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf) where $timeFilter

panels.description: Hosts connected to switchports and discovered using LLDP

targets.query: select count(peer_name) from (select peer_name,last(tx_bytes) from "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" where peer_type='host' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/) and $timeFilter group by peer_name) where $timeFilter

panels.title: # Hosts in $location

targets.query: select count(last) AS "Switch" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and peer_type='switch') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Host" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and peer_type='host') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "400G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "oper_speed" = 400) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "100G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "oper_speed" = 100) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "25G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "oper_speed" = 25) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "10G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "1G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "access" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and oper_mode = 'access') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "trunk" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and oper_mode = 'trunk') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Up" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and oper_state = 'up') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Down" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and oper_state = 'down') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "None" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and oper_state = 'None') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Unknown" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and oper_state = '') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Admin Down" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "down_reason" = 'admin-down') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "XCVR Absent" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "down_reason" = 'xcvr-absent') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Link Failure" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "down_reason" = 'link-failure') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT switchname as "Switch Name", last(sys_ver) as "NX-OS Version", kernel_uptime as "Kernel Uptime",model as "Switch Model", cpu_kernel as "CPU Util - Kernel", cpu_user as "CPU Util - User", ("mem_used")/("mem_total")*100 as "Memory Util", response_time as "Response Time" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,location

value.title: Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}

targets.query: SELECT switchname as "Switch Name", location as "Location", last(description) as "Description", oper_state as "Operational State", oper_mode as "Oper Mode", down_reason as "Down Reason", oper_speed as "Speed", peer as "Peer Device", peer_type as "Peer Type", peer_name as "Peer Name", peer_intf as "Peer Interface" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf

select sum("RX Traffic") as "Total RX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(max(rx_bytes))*8/elapsed(max(oper_speed),1s) as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and oper_state != 'down') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${__interval}),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${__interval})

select sum("TX Traffic") as "Total TX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_bytes))*8/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ and type='nexus' and oper_state != 'down') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum("gbps") as "Total TX Traffic" from (SELECT derivative(tx_bytes)*8/1000000000 as "gbps" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "oper_state" != 'down' and type='nexus' and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switch,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by time($__interval)

value.title: Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}

targets.query: select top("util",intf,switchname,Speed, peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf,10) as "% RX Utilization" from (select max("gbps")*100/max("speed") as "util", max("speed") as "Speed" from (SELECT derivative(rx_bytes)*8/1000000000 as "gbps", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter group by intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter

value.title: Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}

targets.query: select top("util",intf,switchname,Speed, peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf,10) as "% TX Utilization" from (select max("gbps")*100/max("speed") as "util", max("speed") as "Speed" from (SELECT derivative(tx_bytes)*8/1000000000 as "gbps", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter group by intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter

value.title: Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}

targets.query: select top("util",intf,switchname,Speed, peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf,10) as "RX Throughput" from (select max("gbps") as "util", max("speed") as "Speed" from (SELECT derivative(rx_bytes)*8/1000000000 as "gbps", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter group by intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter

value.title: Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}

targets.query: select top("util",intf,switchname,Speed, peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf,10) as "TX Throughput" from (select max("gbps") as "util", max("speed") as "Speed" from (SELECT derivative(tx_bytes)*8/1000000000 as "gbps", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter group by intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total CRC" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_crc))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s)  FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Stomped CRC" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_crc_stomped))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s)  FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "oper_state" != 'down'  and "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

value.title: Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}

targets.query: select top("max",intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf,10) as "CRC" from (select max("CRC") from(SELECT last(rx_crc) - first(rx_crc) as "CRC" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter

value.title: Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}

targets.query: select top("max",intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf,10) as "Stomped CRC" from (select max("CRC") from(SELECT last(rx_crc_stomped) - first(rx_crc_stomped) as "CRC" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter

select sum("last_first") as "Total Random Dropped Packets" from (SELECT last(rand_drop_pkts) - first(rand_drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,q) where $timeFilter

select sum("last_first") as "Total Dropped Packets" from (SELECT last(drop_pkts) - first(drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,q) where $timeFilter

value.title: Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}

targets.query: select top("max",intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf,10) as "Random Drops" from (select max("rand_drop_pkts") from(SELECT last(rand_drop_pkts) - first(rand_drop_pkts) as "rand_drop_pkts" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter

value.title: Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}

targets.query: select top("max",intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf,10) as "Drops" from (select max("drop_pkts") from(SELECT last(drop_pkts) - first(drop_pkts) as "drop_pkts" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switchname,peer_type,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter

list.definition: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" with key=location where type='nexus' and $timeFilter
list.label: Location
list.name: location
list.query: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" with key=location where type='nexus' and $timeFilter

list.definition: select last(elapsed) from (select elapsed(switchname,1s) from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where location =~ /$location/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter)
list.name: min_interval
list.query: select last(elapsed) from (select elapsed(switchname,1s) from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where location =~ /$location/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter)
